author: bago
msg: Remote SMTPResponseEncoder by moving RetCodeResponse encoding logic into the RetCodeResponse implementation (SMTPResponse) so that we can directly use AbstractResponseEncoder (that is not anymore abstract). Refactored fields to use generic interfaces when available.
